Name: Lawnmower Game: Pinball
About the game: Introduction: Lawnmower game: Pinball is newest addition to Lawnmower themed game series. This simple game is pinball game with lawnmower themed tables and objects. So just shoot ball and try get as much points as you can. Player can use 3 balls plus possible earned bonus balls. Game contains 6 lawnmower themed tables. Tables contains lawnmower objects and different ramps Features: - Lawnmower themes tables - 6 levels/tables - Steam achievements
